sentences.english: Cook the risotto until soft, add white wine and cream cook 1 to 2 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 將意大利飯煮至軟身，加入白酒和忌廉煮一至兩分鐘。

sentences.english: And new technology products, superior quality, to set up factories in cheaper prices purposes.
sentences.chinese: 並以產品技術新，質量優，價格廉爲辦廠宗旨。

sentences.english: We take the new product technology, excellent quality and low price as the running principle of our factory.
sentences.chinese: 並以產品技術新，質量優，價格廉爲辦廠宗旨。

sentences.english: Which excellent Kunming floor thing price is cheap?
sentences.chinese: 昆明哪的地板物優價廉？

sentences.english: Add egg and sugar into the cream cheese until smooth.
sentences.chinese: 加入蛋及糖於忌廉芝士中，打至幼滑。

sentences.english: Complete Translation (CT) and Translation Variation(TV) is a pair of notion proposed by Chinese scholar Huang Zhonglian.
sentences.chinese: 全譯與變譯是中國學者黃忠廉提出的一對概念。

sentences.english: Please contact with Jack Lian directly if you are interested.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有興趣參加，請直接與活動聯繫人廉鵬飛聯繫。
